response.overview: When you can do whatever you want, in someone's living room, someone's bedroom, a bar, a classroom in session, a solemn conference hall, what would you do? The current environment is suffocating, and the accumulated pressure has no outlet. What should a person be like? What kind of mood should one live with? If you don't want to do anything, will you fall into nothingness? Are those solemn and regulated forms reasonable? Before getting the answers, just let it out first.
response.title: Sh
